templates.name: Nginx Web Server
templates.description: Lekki serwer HTTP i reverse proxy
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  web:
    image: nginx:alpine
    ports:
      - "80:80"
    volumes:
      - ./html:/usr/share/nginx/html
    restart: unless-stopped

templates.name: MySQL Database
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:8.0
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
      MYSQL_DATABASE: mydb
      MYSQL_USER: user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    restart: always

volumes:
  db_data:

templates.name: WordPress with MySQL
templates.description: Kompletna instalacja WordPress z bazą danych
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:5.7
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example_root_password
      MYSQL_DATABASE: wordpress
      MYSQL_USER: wordpress
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: example_password

  wordpress:
    depends_on:
      - db
    image: wordpress:latest
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    environment:
      WORDPRESS_DB_HOST: db:3306
      WORDPRESS_DB_USER: wordpress
      WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD: example_password
      WORDPRESS_DB_NAME: wordpress

volumes:
  db_data:

templates.name: PostgreSQL
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  postgres:
    image: postgres:13
    environment:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: example_password
      POSTGRES_USER: example_user
      POSTGRES_DB: example_db
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:

templates.name: Portainer CE
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  portainer:
    image: portainer/portainer-ce:latest
    ports:
      - "9000:9000"
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - portainer_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  portainer_data:

templates.name: Redis
templates.description: Serwer cache i baza danych key-value
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  redis_data:

templates.name: Grafana
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    volumes:
      - grafana_data:/var/lib/grafana
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  grafana_data:

templates.name: Jupyter Notebook
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  jupyter:
    image: jupyter/datascience-notebook:latest
    ports:
      - "8888:8888"
    volumes:
      - ./notebooks:/home/jovyan/work
    environment:
      - JUPYTER_TOKEN=mysecretpassword
    restart: unless-stopped

templates.name: MongoDB
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  mongodb:
    image: mongo:latest
    ports:
      - "27017:27017"
    volumes:
      - mongodb_data:/data/db
    environment:
      MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root
      MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
    restart: always

volumes:
  mongodb_data:

templates.name: Nextcloud
templates.description: Platforma do przechowywania plików w chmurze
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  nextcloud:
    image: nextcloud:latest
    ports:
      - "8080:80"
    volumes:
      - nextcloud_data:/var/www/html
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  nextcloud_data:

templates.name: Traefik
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  traefik:
    image: traefik:latest
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
      - "8080:8080"
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - ./traefik.toml:/etc/traefik/traefik.toml
    restart: always

templates.name: Prometheus
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    ports:
      - "9090:9090"
    volumes:
      - ./prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
    restart: always

templates.name: Elasticsearch + Kibana
templates.description: Platforma do wyszukiwania i analizy danych
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  elasticsearch:
    image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.17.0
    environment:
      - discovery.type=single-node
    volumes:
      - es_data:/usr/share/elasticsearch/data
    ports:
      - "9200:9200"

  kibana:
    image: docker.elastic.co/kibana/kibana:7.17.0
    ports:
      - "5601:5601"
    depends_on:
      - elasticsearch

volumes:
  es_data:

templates.name: GitLab CE
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  gitlab:
    image: gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
      - "22:22"
    volumes:
      - gitlab_config:/etc/gitlab
      - gitlab_logs:/var/log/gitlab
      - gitlab_data:/var/opt/gitlab
    restart: always

volumes:
  gitlab_config:
  gitlab_logs:
  gitlab_data:

templates.name: MariaDB
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  mariadb:
    image: mariadb:latest
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
      MYSQL_DATABASE: mydb
      MYSQL_USER: user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    volumes:
      - mariadb_data:/var/lib/mysql
    restart: always

volumes:
  mariadb_data:

templates.name: Adminer
templates.description: Lekki interfejs webowy do zarządzania bazami danych
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  adminer:
    image: adminer:latest
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    restart: always

templates.name: phpMyAdmin + MySQL
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:8.0
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql

  phpmyadmin:
    image: phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    environment:
      PMA_HOST: db
    depends_on:
      - db
    restart: always

volumes:
  db_data:

templates.name: RabbitMQ
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  rabbitmq:
    image: rabbitmq:management
    ports:
      - "5672:5672"
      - "15672:15672"
    volumes:
      - rabbitmq_data:/var/lib/rabbitmq
    restart: always

volumes:
  rabbitmq_data:

templates.name: MinIO
templates.description: Obiektowy serwer plików kompatybilny z S3
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  minio:
    image: minio/minio
    ports:
      - "9000:9000"
      - "9001:9001"
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: minioadmin
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: minioadmin
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    restart: always

volumes:
  minio_data:

templates.name: Vaultwarden
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  vaultwarden:
    image: vaultwarden/server:latest
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    volumes:
      - vaultwarden_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  vaultwarden_data:

templates.name: Home Assistant
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  homeassistant:
    image: ghcr.io/home-assistant/home-assistant:stable
    volumes:
      - homeassistant_config:/config
    ports:
      - "8123:8123"
    restart: always

volumes:
  homeassistant_config:

templates.name: Plex Media Server
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  plex:
    image: plexinc/pms-docker
    ports:
      - "32400:32400"
    volumes:
      - plex_config:/config
      - plex_transcode:/transcode
      - /path/to/media:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  plex_config:
  plex_transcode:

templates.name: WireGuard VPN
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  wireguard:
    image: linuxserver/wireguard
    cap_add:
      - NET_ADMIN
      - SYS_MODULE
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    volumes:
      - wireguard_config:/config
      - /lib/modules:/lib/modules
    ports:
      - "51820:51820/udp"
    sysctls:
      - net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1
    restart: always

volumes:
  wireguard_config:

templates.name: Matomo Analytics
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  matomo:
    image: matomo:apache
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    volumes:
      - matomo_data:/var/www/html
    restart: always

  mariadb:
    image: mariadb:10.6
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
      MYSQL_DATABASE: matomo
    volumes:
      - mariadb_data:/var/lib/mysql
    restart: always

volumes:
  matomo_data:
  mariadb_data:

templates.name: Gitea
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  gitea:
    image: gitea/gitea:latest
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
      - "2222:22"
    volumes:
      - gitea_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  gitea_data:

templates.name: Zabbix
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  zabbix-server:
    image: zabbix/zabbix-server-mysql:latest
    ports:
      - "10051:10051"
    environment:
      DB_SERVER_HOST: zabbix-mysql
      MYSQL_USER: zabbix
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: zabbix
      MYSQL_DATABASE: zabbix
    depends_on:
      - zabbix-mysql
    restart: always

  zabbix-web:
    image: zabbix/zabbix-web-nginx-mysql:latest
    ports:
      - "8000:8080"
    environment:
      DB_SERVER_HOST: zabbix-mysql
      MYSQL_USER: zabbix
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: zabbix
      MYSQL_DATABASE: zabbix
      ZBX_SERVER_HOST: zabbix-server
    depends_on:
      - zabbix-server
    restart: always

  zabbix-mysql:
    image: mysql:8.0
    environment:
      MYSQL_DATABASE: zabbix
      MYSQL_USER: zabbix
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: zabbix
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
    volumes:
      - zabbix_mysql:/var/lib/mysql
    restart: always

volumes:
  zabbix_mysql:

templates.name: Emby Unlocked
templates.description: Serwer multimedialny z odblokowanymi funkcjami premium
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  emby:
    image: gekomod/emby-unlocked:latest
    ports:
      - "8096:8096"
      - "8920:8920"
    volumes:
      - emby_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  emby_config:

templates.name: Jellyfin
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  jellyfin:
    image: jellyfin/jellyfin:latest
    ports:
      - "8096:8096"
      - "8920:8920"
    volumes:
      - jellyfin_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
      - /path/to/cache:/cache
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  jellyfin_config:

templates.name: Sonarr + Radarr + Prowlarr
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  sonarr:
    image: linuxserver/sonarr:latest
    ports:
      - "8989:8989"
    volumes:
      - sonarr_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

  radarr:
    image: linuxserver/radarr:latest
    ports:
      - "7878:7878"
    volumes:
      - radarr_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

  prowlarr:
    image: linuxserver/prowlarr:latest
    ports:
      - "9696:9696"
    volumes:
      - prowlarr_config:/config
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  sonarr_config:
  radarr_config:
  prowlarr_config:

templates.name: qBittorrent + VPN
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  qbittorrent:
    image: gekomod/qbittorrentvpn:latest
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
      - "6881:6881"
      - "6881:6881/udp"
    volumes:
      - qbit_config:/config
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
      - VPN_ENABLED=yes
      - VPN_TYPE=openvpn
      - VPN_USER=your_username
      - VPN_PASS=your_password
    cap_add:
      - NET_ADMIN
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  qbit_config:

templates.name: Overseerr
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  overseerr:
    image: sctx/overseerr:latest
    ports:
      - "5055:5055"
    volumes:
      - overseerr_config:/config
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  overseerr_config:

templates.name: Audiobookshelf
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  audiobookshelf:
    image: advplyr/audiobookshelf:latest
    ports:
      - "13378:80"
    volumes:
      - abs_config:/config
      - /path/to/audiobooks:/audiobooks
      - /path/to/podcasts:/podcasts
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  abs_config:
